long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monopoly - Chrome Extension
Experience the classic game of strategy and luck with Monopoly, now in a convenient Chrome Extension!

Build your real estate empire, trade properties, and outsmart your opponents to become the ultimate tycoon. With familiar gameplay and vibrant graphics, you can enjoy all the excitement of Monopoly right in your browser.

Play solo against AI, or challenge your friends for a fun and competitive game night.

Download Monopoly and roll the dice on your next adventure!
